channel.title: VM on wubigo
channel.description: Recent content in VM on wubigo

item.title: 分配Vmware虚机静态IP
item.description: 虚机网卡地址 配置静态IP C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\VMware\vmnetdhcp.conf host VMnet8 { hardware ethernet 00:0C:29:23:AV:67; fixed-address 192.168.137.170; } 重启VMWARE DHCP服务 net stop vmnetdhcp net start vmnetdhcp
